children.text: There is a chipped tile unit that detracts from the overall finish.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3958.1 Ceramic Tiles - Guide to the Installation of Ceramic Tiles, Clause 5.4.3 Fitting states that
‘Cut edges smooth and install the tile without jagged or flaked edge’ .
Additionally, the Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances, clause 11.05 Cracked, pitted, chipped, scratched or loose tiles states that
‘Tiles are defective if they are cracked, pitted, chipped, scratched or loose at handover’ .
This tile must be rectified or replaced in accordance with above.
